prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Guitar, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Guitar, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Guitar, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums, excluding the Synth Pad.
